original_title: Not the Bradys XXX: Bradys Meet the Partridge Family
overview: When her grades suffer, Mike & Carol write a letter that reaches the Partridge family's record company. Hilarious fun & wild sex results especially when Greg becomes 'Johnny Bravo' & tries to get signed by their label. All hell breaks lose in this wild and funny spoof of the hit 70's show!
title: Not the Bradys XXX: Bradys Meet the Partridge Family
